> "Lets go to the entrance. I think Zardus is there," he says, setting
> his stun gun on charge as he turns around, heading for the entrance
> of
> the base.
>

{Scorpina}

    Nodding Scorpina followed, "So why the weapon, expecting a fight when we
get there?" Her own hands flexed opening up the claws of her beast mode that
served as a bair of arm bracers in her robot form, small missiles can be
seen on the inside of them..."If there's a fight, I'm ready!"
